item.title: About Me
item.author: 13110818005@qq.com (Cai)
item.description: Hello. If you’re here, you’ve either stumbled upon this blog on the internet or you’re a friend/human I know IRL. Regardless of the mechanism of your arrival, thanks for taking a moment to peer into my mind. I can’t promise you’ll find anything cool here, but I can promise that in creating content for this blog, I’m doing my best to be a relatively genuine version of myself. That’s the goal and intent behind this simple space. Enjoy.

item.title: Hello World
item.author: 13110818005@qq.com (Cai)
item.description: 当你看到这一篇Blog，那么说明我晚上没白折腾。
